text: - My name is Andrew.

I'm an engineering manager for
AWS Firewall Manager Service.
My teams helps the customer

to manage all kinds of
firewalls inside AWS.

We generally make
customer's life be easier,
a lot easier,
when they're trying to set up a firewall
in very complex infrastructures.
I was living in Sydney, Australia.
Then AWS did an overseas hiring trip.
And AWS told me, "Hey Andrew, join AWS.
"You will have a great opportunity to

"build a product, launch
a service from scratch."
I found this very interesting
and so I made a decision,

leave sunny Sydney, Australia,
and come to Seattle.
AWS has the mentality of,
"Hey, everybody is a builder."

We join together to
start from small things

and we will create bigger
things for customers.
I believe our team is the place
that have a lot of diversities,

and we are really building
a massive skill service

that helps customer to
protect all their resource
inside AWS.
We need your contribution to help us
to protect our customers on AWS.
(calm music)
